mapper.select: select * from inventory where quantity <= 3 order by quantity
select * from inventory where quantity > 3 order by quantity
mapper.insert: insert into orderlist values('${title}', '${publisher}', '${quantity }', '${ branch}', '${cost}', '${o_date}', '${isbn}', orderNumber.nextval)
mapper.update: update inventory set quantity = quantity + '${quantity}' where isbn = '${ isbn }' and branch = '${branch}'
